entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Cartwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:30 AM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 23 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then clearing. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 23 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Thursday 23 February 2023
